title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy; The Honourable Schoolboy; and Smiley's People
description: Three thrilling tales of espionage from the superselling author of The Spy Who Came in from the Cold. Le Carre's highly acclaimed spy thrillers enjoy long stays on the New York Times bestseller list. Includes Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy, The Honourable Schoolboy, and Smiley's People.
